Fade Animations.ca__fx-fadeIn: Fades in gently from transparent to visible
Fade Animations.ca__fx-fadeInTop: Fades in while moving down from the top
Fade Animations.ca__fx-fadeInBottom: Fades in while moving up from the bottom
Fade Animations.ca__fx-fadeInLeft: Fades in while sliding in from the left
Fade Animations.ca__fx-fadeInRight: Fades in while sliding in from the right
Fade Animations.ca__fx-fadeOut: Fades out gradually until fully transparent
Fade Animations.ca__fx-fadeOutTop: Fades out while moving up to the top
Fade Animations.ca__fx-fadeOutBottom: Fades out while moving down to the bottom

Flip Animations.ca__fx-flipXZoomIn: Flips along X axis while zooming in
Flip Animations.ca__fx-flipXZoomOut: Flips along X axis while zooming out
Flip Animations.ca__fx-flipX: Flips the element along the horizontal (X) axis
Flip Animations.ca__fx-flipY: Flips the element along the vertical (Y) axis
Flip Animations.ca__fx-flipYZoomIn: Flips along Y axis while zooming in
Flip Animations.ca__fx-flipYZoomOut: Flips along Y axis while zooming out

Blur Animations.ca__fx-BlurIn: Blurs in from the center while fading into focus
Blur Animations.ca__fx-BlurInTop: Blurs in from the top edge of the screen
Blur Animations.ca__fx-BlurInBottom: Blurs in upward from the bottom
Blur Animations.ca__fx-BlurInLeft: Blurs in from the left side
Blur Animations.ca__fx-BlurInRight: Blurs in from the right side
Blur Animations.ca__fx-BlurOut: Blurs and fades out toward the center
Blur Animations.ca__fx-blurOutLeft: Blurs and slides out to the left
Blur Animations.ca__fx-blurOutRight: Blurs and slides out to the right

Bounce Animations.ca__fx-bounceFromTop: Bounces in from the top with elasticity
Bounce Animations.ca__fx-BounceFromDown: Bounces up from below the screen
Bounce Animations.ca__fx-bounceInTop: Bounces in and lands from the top
Bounce Animations.ca__fx-bounceInBottom: Bounces in and rises from the bottom
Bounce Animations.ca__fx-bounceInLeft: Bounces in from the left edge
Bounce Animations.ca__fx-bounceInRight: Bounces in from the right edge
Bounce Animations.ca__fx-bounceOutLeft: Bounces out to the left and disappears
Bounce Animations.ca__fx-bounceOutRight: Bounces out to the right and disappears
Bounce Animations.ca__fx-bounceZoomOut: Zooms out with a final bounce

Dance Animations.ca__fx-danceBottom: Bounces and wiggles from the bottom with playful rhythm
Dance Animations.ca__fx-danceMiddle: Wiggles in place around the center as if dancing
Dance Animations.ca__fx-danceTop: Dances in from the top with a lively bounce

Door Animations.ca__fx-doorCloseFromLeft: Closes like a door swinging in from the left side
Door Animations.ca__fx-doorCloseFromRight: Closes like a door swinging in from the right side
Door Animations.ca__fx-doorOpenFromLeft: Opens like a door swinging outward from the left
Door Animations.ca__fx-doorOpenFromRight: Opens like a door swinging outward from the right

Cool Shake Animations.ca__fx-coolHorizontalShake: Performs a smooth, stylish shake left and right — less jittery than a classic shake
Cool Shake Animations.ca__fx-coolVerticalShake: Gently shakes up and down with a controlled, smooth rhythm

General FX & 3D Animations.ca__fx-effect3d: Applies a 3D depth effect using perspective and rotation
General FX & 3D Animations.ca__fx-electricity: Twitches rapidly like a spark or electric jolt

Elevate / Hover Motions.ca__fx-elevateLeft: Lifts the element slightly while shifting it to the left
Elevate / Hover Motions.ca__fx-elevateRight: Lifts the element slightly while shifting it to the right

Hang & Drop Effects.ca__fx-hangAndDropLeft: Swings from the left like it's hanging, then drops
Hang & Drop Effects.ca__fx-hangAndDropRight: Swings from the right and drops like a broken hook
Hang & Drop Effects.ca__fx-hangOnLeft: Swings gently on the left edge like hanging from a rope
Hang & Drop Effects.ca__fx-hangOnRight: Swings on the right as if hanging from the side

Heartbeat.ca__fx-heartbeatFast: Pulses quickly like a fast heartbeat
Heartbeat.ca__fx-heartbeatSlow: Pulses slowly with a calm rhythm
Heartbeat.ca__fx-leBeat: Each letter pulses like a heartbeat

cssanimation Special.ca__fx-hu__hu__: Comical fast shake like a cartoon ‘shiver’ or giggle

Letter Abound Animations.ca__fx-leAboundBottom: Each letter bounces up from the bottom energetically
Letter Abound Animations.ca__fx-leAboundLeft: Each letter bounces in from the left
Letter Abound Animations.ca__fx-leAboundRight: Each letter bounces in from the right
Letter Abound Animations.ca__fx-leAboundTop: Each letter bounces down from the top

Letter Blur In Animations.ca__fx-leBlurIn: Letters blur in from transparent to focused
Letter Blur In Animations.ca__fx-leBlurInTop: Letters blur in from the top
Letter Blur In Animations.ca__fx-leBlurInBottom: Letters blur in upward from the bottom
Letter Blur In Animations.ca__fx-leBlurInLeft: Letters blur in from the left
Letter Blur In Animations.ca__fx-leBlurInRight: Letters blur in from the right

Letter Blur Out Animations.ca__fx-leBlurOut: Letters blur out to become transparent
Letter Blur Out Animations.ca__fx-leBlurOutTop: Letters blur upward as they disappear
Letter Blur Out Animations.ca__fx-leBlurOutBottom: Letters blur downward and fade out
Letter Blur Out Animations.ca__fx-leBlurOutLeft: Letters blur and exit to the left
Letter Blur Out Animations.ca__fx-leBlurOutRight: Letters blur and exit to the right

Letter Bounce Animations.ca__fx-leBounceFromDown: Letters bounce up from below the baseline

Letter Dance Animations.ca__fx-leDanceInBottom: Letters dance in playfully from the bottom
Letter Dance Animations.ca__fx-leDanceInMiddle: Letters wiggle into place at center
Letter Dance Animations.ca__fx-leDanceInTop: Letters drop in with a dancing motion from above
Letter Dance Animations.ca__fx-leDanceOutBottom: Letters bounce out downward with style
Letter Dance Animations.ca__fx-leDanceOutMiddle: Letters shake and fade out at center
Letter Dance Animations.ca__fx-leDanceOutTop: Letters exit upward with a funky motion
Letter Dance Animations.ca__fx-leCrazyCool: Unpredictable and wild dance motion per letter

Letter Door Animations.ca__fx-leDoorOpenLeft: Each letter swings open from the left like a door
Letter Door Animations.ca__fx-leDoorOpenRight: Each letter swings open from the right
Letter Door Animations.ca__fx-leDoorCloseLeft: Each letter swings shut toward the left
Letter Door Animations.ca__fx-leDoorCloseRight: Each letter swings shut toward the right

Letter Elevate Animations.ca__fx-leElevateLeft: Letters lift slightly while sliding left
Letter Elevate Animations.ca__fx-leElevateRight: Letters lift while sliding to the right

Letter Fade In Animations.ca__fx-leFadeIn: Letters fade in gently from transparent to visible
Letter Fade In Animations.ca__fx-leFadeInTop: Letters fade in while falling from the top
Letter Fade In Animations.ca__fx-leFadeInBottom: Letters fade in while rising from below
Letter Fade In Animations.ca__fx-leFadeInLeft: Letters fade in from the left
Letter Fade In Animations.ca__fx-leFadeInRight: Letters fade in from the right

Letter Flip Animations.ca__fx-leFlipInTop: Each letter flips in from above like a card falling into place
Letter Flip Animations.ca__fx-leFlipInBottom: Each letter flips upward into view from below
Letter Flip Animations.ca__fx-leFlipOutTop: Each letter flips upward and disappears over the top
Letter Flip Animations.ca__fx-leFlipOutBottom: Each letter flips downward as it exits the screen

Letter Fly Animations.ca__fx-leFlyInTop: Each letter flies down into view from the top
Letter Fly Animations.ca__fx-leFlyInBottom: Each letter flies up into view from the bottom
Letter Fly Animations.ca__fx-leFlyInLeft: Each letter flies in from the left side
Letter Fly Animations.ca__fx-leFlyInRight: Each letter flies in from the right side
Letter Fly Animations.ca__fx-leFlyOutTop: Each letter flies upward and disappears
Letter Fly Animations.ca__fx-leFlyOutBottom: Each letter flies downward off screen
Letter Fly Animations.ca__fx-leFlyOutLeft: Each letter flies off to the left
Letter Fly Animations.ca__fx-leFlyOutRight: Each letter flies off to the right

Letter Hang & Drop Animations.ca__fx-leHangAndDropLeft: Each letter swings in from the left and drops with gravity
Letter Hang & Drop Animations.ca__fx-leHangAndDropRight: Each letter swings in from the right and drops like it’s tethered

Letter Shake / Tremble Effects.ca__fx-leHorizontalShake: Each letter shakes left and right quickly
Letter Shake / Tremble Effects.ca__fx-leHorizontalTremble: Each letter vibrates with small horizontal trembles

Letter Impact & Energy Motions.ca__fx-leJoltZoom: Each letter jolts forward slightly while zooming in with force
Letter Impact & Energy Motions.ca__fx-leJump: Each letter performs a small jump in place
Letter Impact & Energy Motions.ca__fx-leKickOutFront: Each letter kicks outward toward the viewer with a pop
Letter Impact & Energy Motions.ca__fx-leKickOutBehind: Each letter kicks backward as if pulled behind

Letter Cinematic.ca__fx-leMadMax: A cinematic impact animation inspired by action titles — aggressive and bold
Letter Cinematic.ca__fx-leMagnify: Each letter zooms in briefly with an enlarging lens-like effect
Letter Cinematic.ca__fx-lePerspectiveOutTop: Letters shrink away into the top distance like a vanishing point
Letter Cinematic.ca__fx-lePerspectiveOutBottom: Letters fall away into the bottom distance with perspective depth

Letter Movement & Reveal.ca__fx-leMovingBackFromLeft: Each letter moves in from the left while appearing farther back
Letter Movement & Reveal.ca__fx-leMovingBackFromRight: Each letter moves in from the right with distant motion
Letter Movement & Reveal.ca__fx-lePeek: Each letter peeks in subtly from behind as if hiding before entry
Letter Movement & Reveal.ca__fx-leRainDrop: Letters fall quickly with gravity like raindrops
Letter Movement & Reveal.ca__fx-leRencontre: Elegant meeting motion — letters slide in as if arriving for a rendezvous

Letter Pop & Pulse Effects.ca__fx-lePopOut: Letters pop outward toward the viewer and disappear
Letter Pop & Pulse Effects.ca__fx-lePopOutLeft: Letters pop to the left and vanish
Letter Pop & Pulse Effects.ca__fx-lePopOutRight: Letters pop to the right and vanish
Letter Pop & Pulse Effects.ca__fx-lePopUp: Letters quickly pop up from below
Letter Pop & Pulse Effects.ca__fx-lePopUpLeft: Letters pop up while shifting slightly left
Letter Pop & Pulse Effects.ca__fx-lePopUpRight: Letters pop up while moving to the right
Letter Pop & Pulse Effects.ca__fx-lePulseShake: Each letter pulses and vibrates slightly like a heartbeat tremor

Letter Letter Push & Release Motions.ca__fx-lePushReleaseFrom: Letters push into view and bounce back to original position
Letter Letter Push & Release Motions.ca__fx-lePushReleaseFromBottom: Letters push up from below and release gently
Letter Letter Push & Release Motions.ca__fx-lePushReleaseFromLeft: Letters push in from the left and fall back
Letter Letter Push & Release Motions.ca__fx-lePushReleaseFromTop: Letters push down from the top then release
Letter Letter Push & Release Motions.ca__fx-lePushReleaseToBottom: Letters push downward and fade out
